comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The picture behind them is Les Demoiselles d'Avignon by Picasso. See www.moma.org/collection/browse_results.php?criteria=O%3AA... is another picture of the MoMA visit, with Picasso's Guernica.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another photo of the boys with Picasso's Les Demoiselles d'Avignon, posted by LOC on November 19, 2010:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5189935770/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This photo from the MOMA shoot actually appeared in Downbeat. See hdl.loc.gov/loc.music/wgpubs.052 for a scan of the article Got (Bill Gottlieb) wrote about the visit!
